step.cmd: Select the Blind transcription check box and double-click on the session that you would like to transcribe.
step.stepresult: This will open a dialog prompting you to indicate whether you are a new or existing transcriber.

choices.choice: If you are a new transcriber, choose the first option and enter your full name as well as a username. If you wish to use a password, select Use password and enter your chosen password into the two fields provided (the text in both fields must match). There is no password reminder function in Phon. Ensure that your password is memorable or store it in a safe location. Click Ok to continue.

If you are a returning transcriber, choose the second option and select your username from the list. If you have chosen to use a password, you will be prompted to enter that password now. Do so and click Ok.

step.stepresult: This will open the Session Editor window. Upon opening a session for the first time, there will be an empty record at the beginning of each session.
